name: Wellington Partners
overview:
Wellington Partners is a venture capital firm that invests in technology and life sciences companies, focusing on Digital Media, Cleantech, Electronics, Sofware, and Biotech/Life Sciences.

Stage Focus Stage agnostic (seed, early-stage and growth investments)

Wellington has offices in Munich, London, Palo Alto, and Zurich.
